page_title: My Best Agent - AI That Actually Does Things

usecases_subtitle: Not just answers. Real actions, real results.
usecase_email_desc: Reads your inbox, summarizes urgent messages, drafts replies, and sends them on your behalf. You approve, it executes.
usecase_website_desc: Designs, codes, and deploys a complete website. Landing pages, portfolios, online stores — in minutes, not weeks.
usecase_data_desc: Opens your files, extracts data, creates charts, spots trends. Turns raw data into actionable insights.
usecase_social_desc: Writes content, schedules posts, responds to comments. Manages your social presence while you sleep.
usecase_messaging_desc: Sends WhatsApp, Telegram, or email messages for you. Scheduled reminders, status updates, follow-ups — all automated.
usecase_research_desc: Searches the web, reads articles, compiles reports. Delivers a summary with sources — hours of work in minutes.
section_how_subtitle: Four simple steps to your own AI agent
step_1_desc: Sign up in seconds. Give your agent a name. No code, no setup, no technical skills required.
step_2_desc: Link your email, Telegram, WhatsApp, calendar. Your agent learns where to reach you and what you need.
step_3_desc: Send a message like you'd text a friend. "Book a meeting", "Send this file to John", "Remind me tomorrow at 9am".
step_4_desc: Your agent executes, reports back, and learns. The more you use it, the better it gets.
section_features_subtitle: From asking ChatGPT to having a real assistant
feature_fullstack_desc: Other AIs just talk. Your agent creates files, sends messages, browses the web, fills spreadsheets. Real actions.
feature_context_desc: Remembers your preferences, your contacts, your schedule. No need to repeat yourself. Ever.
feature_execute_desc: Set it and forget it. Scheduled tasks, automatic check-ins, proactive alerts. 24/7 without you lifting a finger.
feature_everywhere_desc: Chat on web, Telegram, WhatsApp, email. Same agent, same memory, same capabilities. Switch devices seamlessly.
feature_secure_desc: End-to-end encrypted. We can't see your data. You can delete everything anytime. No ads, no tracking.
feature_improve_desc: New capabilities every month. Your agent evolves with you. Early users shape the roadmap.
section_pricing_subtitle: Unlimited messages, zero cost. We're building something new and we need your feedback.
